typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CurrencyKey as integer,
		CustomerKey as integer,
		DiscountAmount as integer,
		DueDateKey as integer,
		ExtendedAmount as double,
		Freight as double,
		OrderDateKey as integer,
		OrderQuantity as integer,
		ProductKey as integer,
		ProductStandardCost as double,
		PromotionKey as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		SalesAmount as double,
		SalesOrderLineNumber as integer,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		SalesTerritoryKey as integer,
		ShipDateKey as integer,
		TaxAmt as double,
		TotalProductCost as double,
		UnitPrice as double,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	throughput: 2000) ~> factsales
source(output(
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		BirthDate as long,
		CommuteDistance as string,
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		CustomerKey as integer,
		DateFirstPurchase as long,
		EmailAddress as string,
		EnglishEducation as string,
		EnglishOccupation as string,
		FirstName as string,
		FrenchEducation as string,
		FrenchOccupation as string,
		Gender as string,
		GeographyKey as integer,
		HouseOwnerFlag as string,
		LastName as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		NumberCarsOwned as integer,
		NumberChildrenAtHome as integer,
		Phone as string,
		SpanishEducation as string,
		SpanishOccupation as string,
		Title as string,
		TotalChildren as integer,
		YearlyIncome as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	throughput: 2000) ~> dimcust
source(output(
		ArabicDescription as string,
		ChineseDescription as string,
		Class as string,
		Color as string,
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		DealerPrice as double,
		EndDate as long,
		EnglishDescription as string,
		EnglishProductName as string,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		FrenchDescription as string,
		FrenchProductName as string,
		GermanDescription as string,
		HebrewDescription as string,
		JapaneseDescription as string,
		ListPrice as double,
		ModelName as string,
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		ProductKey as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		ProductSubcategoryKey as integer,
		ReorderPoint as integer,
		SafetyStockLevel as integer,
		Size as string,
		SizeRange as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		SpanishProductName as string,
		StandardCost as double,
		StartDate as long,
		Status as string,
		Style as string,
		ThaiDescription as string,
		TurkishDescription as string,
		Weight as double,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	throughput: 2000) ~> dimprod
factsales, dimcust join(factsales@CustomerKey == dimcust@CustomerKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StarJoin
StarJoin, dimprod join(factsales@ProductKey == dimprod@ProductKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StarJoin2
StarJoin2 select(mapColumn(
		OrderDateKey,
		OrderQuantity,
		ProductStandardCost,
		SalesAmount,
		TaxAmt,
		TotalProductCost,
		UnitPrice,
		AddressLine1,
		EnglishEducation,
		EnglishOccupation,
		FirstName,
		Gender,
		HouseOwnerFlag,
		LastName,
		MaritalStatus,
		NumberCarsOwned,
		NumberChildrenAtHome,
		Phone,
		Title,
		TotalChildren,
		Class,
		Color,
		EnglishProductName,
		ListPrice,
		ModelName,
		Style,
		Weight
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ShapeData
ShapeData aggregate(groupBy(MaritalStatus,
		HouseOwnerFlag),
	salesbyownermarried = toDecimal(sum(SalesAmount),10,2)) ~> SalesByOwnerByMarried
ShapeData aggregate(groupBy(Color,
		Style),
	salesbycolorstyle = toDecimal(sum(SalesAmount),10,2)) ~> SalesByColorStyle
ShapeData aggregate(groupBy(NumberCarsOwned,
		NumberChildrenAtHome),
	avgsales = toDecimal(sum(SalesAmount),10,2)) ~> AvgSalesByCarsAndChildren
SalesByOwnerByMarried sort(desc(salesbyownermarried, true)) ~> Sort1
AvgSalesByCarsAndChildren sort(desc(avgsales, true)) ~> Sort2
SalesByColorStyle sort(desc(salesbycolorstyle, true)) ~> Sort3
Sort1 derive(tshash = 'TotalSalesByHomeOwnerAndMarried',
		salesbyownermarried = toDouble(salesbyownermarried)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Sort2 derive(tshash = 'AverageSales',
		avgsales = toDouble(avgsales)) ~> DerivedColumn2
Sort3 derive(tshash = 'TotalSalesByColorAndStyle',
		salesbycolorstyle = toDouble(salesbycolorstyle)) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/tshash'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/tshash'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink2
DerivedColumn3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/tshash'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink3
